channel.title: Portforwarding problem
channel.description:
Hi, i have a problem with portforwarding i dont know the pass of my router configuration I know i dont need a router to let other peeps on my server and my question is: HOW CAN I PORTFORWARD OR LETTING OTHER PEOPLE PLAYING ON MY SERVER WITHOUT A ROUTER OR HAMACHI?
Thank you 0wn3d :D
plz answer
